title: DSM-5 精神障碍诊断与统计手册第五版:  精神障碍名称一览 （中英文对照)
content:
本清单制作者：药儿 YWR， 转载请注明出处

神经发育障碍：Neurodevelopmental Disorders

智力障碍：Intellectual Disabilities

    1. 智力障碍(智力发育障碍）Intellectual Disability (Intellectual Developmental Disorder)
    2. 全面发育迟缓 F88 Global Developmental Delay
    3. 未特定的智力障碍（智力发育障碍） F79 Unspecified Intellectual Disability (Intellectual Developmental Disorder)

交流障碍：Communication Disorders

    1. 语言障碍 F80.9 Language Disorder
    2. 语音障碍 F80.0 Speech Sound Disorder
    3. 童年发生的言语流畅障碍（口吃） F80.81 Childhood-Onset Fluency Disorder (Stuttering)
    4. 社交（语用）交流障碍 F80.89 Social (Pragmatic) Communication Disorder
    5. 未特定的交流障碍 F80.9 Unspecified Communication Disorder

孤独症（自闭症）谱系障碍：Autism Spectrum Disorder

    1. 孤独症（自闭症）谱系障碍 F84.0 Autism Spectrum Disorder

注意缺陷/多动障碍：Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder

    1. 注意缺陷/多动障碍 Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder
    2. 其他特定的注意缺陷/多动障碍 F90.8 Other Specified Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder
    3. 未特定的注意缺陷/多动障碍 F80.9 Unspecified Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder

特定学习障碍：Specific Learning Disorder

    1. 特定学习障碍 Specific Learning Disorder

运动障碍：Motor Disorders

    1. 发育性协调障碍 F82 Developmental Coordination Disorder
    2. 刻板运动障碍 F98.4 Stereotypic Movement Disorder
    3. 抽动障碍：Tic Disorders
      1. Tourette氏障碍 F95.2 Tourette’s Disorder
      2. 持续性（慢性）运动或发声抽动障碍 F95.1 Persistent (Chronic) Motor or Vocal Tic Disorde
      3. 暂时性抽动障碍 F95.0 Provisional Tic Disorder
    4. 其他特定的抽动障碍 F95.8 Other Specified Tic Disorder
    5. 其他未特定的抽动障碍 F95.9 Unspecified Tic Disorder

其他神经发育障碍：Other Neurodevelopmental Disorders

    1. 其他特定的神经发育障碍 F88 Other Specified Neurodevelopmental Disorder
    2. 未特定的神经发育障碍 F89 Unspecified Neurodevelopmental Disorder

精神分裂症谱系及其他精神病性障碍 Schizophrenia Spectrum and other Psychotic Disorders:

    1. 分裂型（人格）障碍 （F21）Schizotypal (Personality) Disorder
      1. 列为人格障碍这一章
    2. 妄想障碍 （F22）Delusional Disorder
      1. 只有妄想delusion
    3. 短暂精神病性障碍 （F23）Brief Psychotic Disorder <1 month
    4. 精神分裂症样障碍 （F20.81) Schizophreniform Disorder (F20.81) 1<x<6 months
    5. 精神分裂症 （F20.9) Schizophrenia (F20.9) >6 months
    6. 分裂情感性障碍 Schizoaffective Disorder >6 months
    7. 物质/药物所致的精神病性障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Psychotic Disorder
    8. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的精神病性障碍 Psychotic Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition
    9. 紧张症 Catatonia
      1. 与其他精神障碍有关的紧张症 （F06.1) Catatonia Associated With Another Mental Disorder (Catatonia Specifirer) (F06.1)
      2. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的紧张症 （F06.1) Catatonic Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition (F06.1)
      3. 未特定的紧张症 Unspecified Catatonia
      4. 其他特定的精神分裂症谱系及其他精神病性障碍 （F28) Other specified Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorder （F28)
      5. 未特定的精神分裂症谱系及其他精神病性障碍 （F29) Unspecified Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorder （F29)

神经认知障碍: Neurocognitive Disorders:

神经认知领域：Neurocognitive Domains

    1. 复杂的注意
    2. 执行功能
    3. 学习和记忆
    4. 语言
    5. 知觉运动
    6. 社交认知

1.谵妄 Delirium:

(波动注意，意识不稳，认知障碍）

2.其他特定的谵妄 （R41.0) Other Specified Delirium

3.未特定的谵妄 (R41.0) Unspecified Delirium

重度和轻度神经认知障碍 Major and Mild Neurocognitive Disorders:

1.重度神经认知障碍 Major Neurocognitive Disorder

2.轻度神经认知障碍 Mild Neurocognitive Disorder

3.由于阿尔海默兹病所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Alzheimer’s Disease

（学习与记忆）AD--1st cause of demetia--记不得最近的事情 recent event

4.重度或轻度额颞叶神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Frontotemporal Neurocognitive Disorder

（行为与语言）

5.重度或轻度神经认知障碍伴路易体 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder With Lewy Bodies

（波动注意，视幻觉 fluctuating sensorium, pathognomonic alphasynuclein tangles (Lewy Bodies)）

6.重度或轻度血管性神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Vascular Neurocognitive Disorder

(hypertension and strokes (高血压和中风； 注意，执行功能)--2nd cause of dementia

7.由于创伤性脑损伤所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Traumatic Brain Injury

（大脑撞击，意识丧失，创伤后遗忘 症，定向不良，神经系统体征：癫痫）

8.物质/药物所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder

(alcohol)

9.由于HIV感染所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to HIV Infection

(有感染人类免疫缺陷病毒）

10.由于朊病毒病所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Prion Disease

（肌阵挛）

11.由于帕金森式病所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Parkinson’s Disease

(运动控制 loss of dopaminergic, loss of motor control)

12.由于亨廷顿氏病所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Huntington’s Disease

( 运动控制 loss of motor control, cognitive impairment)

13.由于其他躯体疾病所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition

14.由于多种病因所致的重度或轻度神经认知障碍 Major or Mild Neurocognitive Disorder Due to Multiple Etiologies

15.未特定的神经认知障碍（R41.9) Unspecified Neurocognitive Disorder

心境障碍I 抑郁障碍：Mood Disorder I Depressive Disorders:

    1. 破坏性心境失调障碍 （F34.8) Disruptive Mood Dysregulation Disorder (F34.8)
      1. Chronic, severe persistent irritability
      2. Common among Children
    2. 重性抑郁障碍 Major Depressive Disorder
    3. 持续性抑郁障碍（心境恶劣）（F34.1) Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymia) (F34.1)
    4. 经前期烦躁障碍（N94.3) Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder (N94.3)
    5. 物质-药物所致的抑郁障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Depressive Disorder
    6. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的抑郁障碍 Depressive Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition
    7. 其他特定的抑郁障碍（F32.8) Other Specified Depressive Disorder (F32.8)
    8. 未特定的抑郁障碍（F32.9) Unspecified Depressive Disorder (F32.9)

心境障碍II 双相及相关障碍 Mood Disorder II Bipolar and Related Disorders:

    1. 双相I型障碍 Bipolar I Disorder
    2. 双相II型障碍 （F31.81) Bipolar II Disorder
    3. 环性心境障碍 （F34.0) cyclothymia Cyclothymic Disorder
    4. 物质-药物所致的双相及相关障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Bipolar and Related Disorder
    5. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的双相及相关障碍 Bipolar and Related Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition
    6. 其他特定的双相及相关障碍（F31.89）Other Specified Bipolar and Related Disorder
    7. 未特定的双相及相关障碍（F31.9) Unspecified Bipolar and Related Disorder
    • Bipolar I: any disorders that shows mania episode
      • If showing depressive symptoms as well, consider mixed featured
    • Bipolar II: hypomania, and with depression

焦虑障碍：Anxiety Disorders:

1.分离焦虑 (F93.0) Separation Anxiety Disorder

2.选择性缄默症 （F94.0) Selective Mutism

3.特定恐怖症 Specific Phobia

4.社交焦虑障碍（社交恐怖症）（F40.10) Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia)

5.惊恐障碍（F41.0) Panic Disorder

6.广场恐怖症（F40.00) Agoraphobia

7.广泛性焦虑障碍（F41.1) Generalized Anxiety Disorder

8.物质药物所致的焦虑障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Anxiety Disorder

9.由于其他躯体疾病所致的焦虑障碍（F06.4) Anxiety Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition

10.其他特定的焦虑障碍（F41.8) Other Specified Anxiety Disorder

11.未特定的焦虑障碍（F41.9) Unspecified Anxiety Disorder

症状共同特点：

1.害怕或焦虑

2.回避恐惧情境 （除了GAD）

3.原因：担心自己的言行或呈现的焦虑症状会导致负性评价（被羞辱或尴尬，导致被拒绝或冒犯他人）（GAD：是焦虑性期待）

强迫及相关障碍：Obsessive-Conplulsive and Related Disorders:

1.强迫症（F42) Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder

2.躯体变形障碍（F45.22) Body Dysmorphic Disorder

3.囤积障碍（F42) Hoarding Disorder

4.拔毛癖/拔毛障碍（F63.2) Trichotillomania (TTM/Hair-Pulling Disorder)

5.抓痕/皮肤瘙痒障碍 （L98.1) Excoriation (Skin-Picking) Disorder

6.物质/药物所致的强迫及相关障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorder

7.由于其他躯体疾病所致的强迫及相关障碍（F06.8) Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition

8.其他特定的强迫及相关障碍（F42）Other Specified Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorder

9.未特定的强迫及相关障碍 （F42）Unspecified Obsessive-Compulsive and Related Disorder

特点：they cannot stop their compulsive behaviors/thoughts (eg. Cannot stop cleaning)

创伤及应激相关障碍：Trauma- and Stressor- Related Disorders:

    1. 反应性依恋障碍 （F94.1) Reactive Attachment Disorder
    2. 去抑制性社会参与障碍 （F94.2) Disinhiblted Social Engagement Disorder
    3. 创伤后应激障碍 （F43.10) Posttraumatic Stress Disorder-->1 month, emphasize on alterrations in cognition and mood with traumatic event
    4. 急性应激障碍 （F43.0) Acute Stress Disorder--3 days to 1 month, emphasize on dissociative symptoms
    5. 适应障碍 Adjustment Disorders--right after the event, removes stressor will stop symptoms at following 6 months
    6. 其他特定的创伤及应激相关障碍 （F43.8) Other Specified Trauma- and Stressor-Related Disorder
    7. 未特定的创伤及应激相关障碍 （F43.9）Unspecified Trauma- and Stressor-Related Disorder

分离障碍：Dissociative Disorders:

    1. 分离性身份障碍 （F44.81) Dissociative Identity Disorder
    2. 分离性遗忘症 （F44.0) Dissociative Amnesia
    3. 人格解体/现实解体障碍 （F48.1) Depersonalization/Dereallzation Disorder
    4. 其他特定的分离障碍 （F44.89) Other Specified Dissociative Disorder
    5. 未特定的分离障碍 （F44.9）Unspecified Dissociative Disorder

躯体症状及相关障碍：Somatic Symptom and Related Disorders:

    1. 躯体症状障碍 （F45.1) Somatic Symptom Disorder >6 months
    2. 疾病焦虑障碍（F45.21) Illness Anxiety Disorder >6 months
    3. 转换障碍（功能性神经症状障碍）Conversion Disorder (Functional Neurological Symptom Disorder)
    4. 影响其他躯体疾病的心理因素 （F54) Psychological Factors Affecting Other Medical Conditions
    5. 做作性障碍（F68.10) Factitious Disorder
    6. 其他特定的躯体症状及相关障碍（F45.8) Other Specified Somatic Symptom and Related Disorder
    7. 未特定的躯体症状及相关障碍 （F45.9) Unspecified Somatic Symptom and Related Disorder

喂食及进食障碍：Feeding and Eating Disorders:

    1. 异食癖 Pica >1 month
    2. 反刍障碍 （F98.21) Rumination Disorder >1 month
    3. 回避性/限制性摄食障碍 （F50.8) Avoidant/Restrictive Food Intake Disorder
      1. no evidence of a disturbance in the way in which one’s body weight or shape is experienced
    4. 神经性厌食 Anorexia Nervosa
      1. (F50.01 Restricting type) 3 months
      2. (F50.02 Binge-eating/purging type) 3 months --with compensatory behaviors to prevent weight gain
    5. 神经性贪食 （F50.2) Bulimia Nervosa 2/week for 3 months --with compensatory behaviors to prevent weight gain
    6. 暴食障碍 （F50.8) Binge-Eating Disorder 1/week for 3 months --no compensatory behaviors to prevent weight gain
    7. 其他特定的喂食或进食障碍 （F50.8) Other Specified Feeding or Eating Disorder
    8. 未特定的喂食或进食障碍 （F50.9) Unspecified Feeding or Eating Disorder

排泄障碍：Elimination Disorders

    1. 遗尿症 F98.0 Enuresis
    2. 遗粪症 F98.1 Encopresis
    3. 其他特定的排泄障碍 Other Specified Elimination Disorder
    4. 未特定的排泄障碍 Unspecified Elimination Disorder

睡眠-觉醒障碍：Sleep-Wake Disorders

    1. 失眠障碍 G47.99 Insomnia Disorder
    2. 过度嗜睡障碍 G47.10 Hypersomnolence Disorder
    3. 发作性睡病 Narcolepsy

与呼吸相关的睡眠障碍：Breathing-Related Sleep Disorders

    1. 阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停低通气 G47.33 Obstructive Sleep Apnea Hypopnea
    2. 中枢性睡眠呼吸暂停 Central Sleep Apnea
    3. 睡眠相关的通气不足 Sleep-Related Hypoventilation
    4. 昼夜节律睡眠-觉醒障碍 Circadian Rhythm Sleep-Wake Disorders

异常睡眠：Parasomnias

    1. 非快速眼动睡眠睡眠唤醒障碍 Non-Rapid Eye Movement Sleep Arousal Disorders
    2. 梦魇障碍 F51.5 Nightmare Disorder
    3. 快速眼动睡眠行为障碍 G47.52 Rapid Eye Movement Sleep Behavior Disorder
    4. 不安腿综合征 G25.81 Restless Legs Syndrome
    5. 物质/药物所致的睡眠障碍 Substance/iVledication-induced Sleep Disorder
    6. 其他特定的失眠障碍 G47.09 Other Specified Insomnia Disorder
    7. 未特定的失眠障碍 G47.00 Unspecified Insomnia Disorder
    8. 其他特定的过度嗜睡障碍 G47.19 Other Specified Hypersomnolence Disorder
    9. 未特定的过度嗜睡障碍 G47.10 Unspecified Hypersomnolence Disorder
    10. 其他特定的睡眠觉醒障碍 G47.8 Other Specified Sleep-Wake Disorder
    11. 未特定的睡眠-觉醒障碍 G47.9 Unspecified Sleep-Wake Disorder

(1)性功能失调： Sexual dysfunctions (F52):

    1. 延迟射精 （F52.32) Delayed Ejaculation
    2. 勃起障碍 （F52.21) Erectile Disorder
    3. 女性性高潮障碍 （F52.31) Female Orgasmic Disorder
    4. 女性性兴趣/勃起障碍 （F52.22) Female Sexual Interest/Arousal Disorder
    5. 生殖器-盆腔痛/插入障碍 （F52.6) Genito-Pelvic Pain/Penetration Disorder
    6. 男性性欲低下障碍 （F52.0) Male Hypoactive Seexual Desire Disorder
    7. 早泄 （F52.4) Premature (Early Ejaculation)
    8. 物质/药物所致的性功能障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Sexual Dysfunction
    9. 其他特定的性功能失调 （F52.8) Other Specified Sexual Dysfunction
    10. 未特定的性功能失调 （F52.9) Unspecified Sexual Dysfunction

(2)性别烦躁: Gender dysphoria (F64):

    1. 儿童性别烦躁 （F64.2) Gendder Dysphoria in Children
    2. 青少年和成人的性别烦躁 （F64.1) Gender Dysphoria in Adolescents and Adults
    3. 其他特定的性别烦躁 （F64.8) Other Specified Gender Dysphoria
    4. 未特定的性别烦躁 （F64.9）Unspecified Gender Dysphoria

(3)性偏好障碍：Paraphilic disorders （F65):

    1. 窥阴癖 (F65.3) Voyeuristic Disorder
    2. 露阴癖 (F65.2) Exhibitionistic Disorder
    3. 摩擦癖 (65.81) Frotteuristic Disorder
    4. 性受虐癖 （F65.51) Sexual Masochism Disorder
    5. 性施虐癖 （F65.52）Sexual Sadism Disorder
    6. 恋童癖（F65.4）Pedophilic Disorder
    7. 恋物癖 （F65.0) Fetishistic Disorder
    8. 异装癖 （F65.1) Transvestic Disorder
    9. 其他特定的性偏好障碍 （F65.89) Other specified paraohilic disorder
    10. 未特定的性偏好障碍 （F65.9）unspecified paraohilic disorder

破坏性、冲动控制及品性障碍：Disruptive, Impulse-Control and Conduct Disorders

    1. 对立违抗障碍 F91.3 Oppositional Defiant Disorder
    2. 间歇性暴怒障碍 F63.81 Intermittent Explosive Disorder
    3. 品行障碍 Conduct Disorder
    4. 反社会型人格障碍 F60.2 Antisocial Personality Disord
    5. 纵火狂 F63.1 Pyromania
    6. 偷窃狂 F63.3 Kleptomania
    7. 其他特定的破坏性、冲动控制及品行障碍 F91.8 Other Specified Disruptive, Impulse-Control, and Conduct Disorder
    8. 未特定的破坏性、冲动控制及品行障碍 F91.9 Unspecified Disruptive, Impulse-Control, and Conduct Disorder

物质相关及成瘾障碍：Substance-Related and Addictive Disorders

    1. 物质相关障碍 Substance-Related Disorders：

物质使用障碍 Substance Use Disorders

物质所致障碍 （中毒和戒断） Substance-Induced Disorders Substance Intoxication and Withdrawal

物质/药物所致的精神障碍 Substance/Medication-Induced Mental Disorders

(1) 酒精相关障碍：Alcohol-Related Disorders

    1. 酒精使用障碍 Alcohol Use Disorder
    2. 酒精中毒 Alcohol Intoxication
    3. 酒精戒断 Alcohol Withdrawal
    4. 其他酒精所致障碍 Other Alcohol-induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的酒精相关障碍 （F10.99) Unspecified Alcohol-Related Disorder

(2) 咖啡因相关障碍：Caffeine-Related Disorders

    1. 咖啡因中毒 （F15.929) Caffeine Intoxication
    2. 咖啡因戒断 （F15.93) Caffeine Withdrawal
    3. 其他咖啡因所致障碍 Other Caffeine-Induced Disorders
    4. 未特定的咖啡因相关障碍 （F15.99) Unspecified Caffeine-Related Disorder

(3) 大麻相关障碍：Cannabis Use Disorder

    1. 大麻使用障碍 Cannabis Use Disorder
    2. 大麻中毒 Cannabis Intoxication
    3. 大麻戒断 （F12.288) Cannabis Withdrawal
    4. 其他大麻所致障碍 Other Cannabis-Induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的大麻相关障碍 （F12.99) Unspecified Cannabis-Related Disorder

(4) 致幻剂相关障碍：（苯环利定 Phencyclidine）Hallucinogen-Related Disorders

    1. 苯环利定使用障碍 Phencyclidine Use Disorder
    2. 其他致幻剂使用障碍 Other Hallucinogen Use Disorder
    3. 苯环利定中毒 Phencyclidine Intoxication
    4. 其他致幻剂中毒 Other Hallucinogen Intoxication
    5. 致幻剂持续性知觉障碍 （F16.983) Hallucinogen Persisting Perception Disorder
    6. 其他苯环利定所致障碍 Other Phencyclidine-induced Disorders
    7. 其他致幻剂所致障碍 Other Hallucinogen-induced Disorders
    8. 未特定的苯环利定相关障碍 （F16.99) Unspecified Phencyclidine-Related Disorder
    9. 未特定的致幻剂相关障碍 （F16.99) Unspecified Hallucinogen-Related Disorder

(5) 吸入剂相关障碍：Inhalant-Related Disorders

    1. 吸入剂使用障碍 Inhalant Use Disorder
    2. 吸入剂中毒 Inhalant Intoxication
    3. 其他吸入剂所致障碍 Other Inhalant-Induced Disorders
    4. 未特定的吸入剂相关障碍 （F18.99) Unspecified Inhalant-Related Disorder

(6) 阿片类物质相关障碍：Opioid-Related Disorders

    1. 阿片类物质使用障碍 Opioid Use Disorder
    2. 阿片类物质中毒 Opioid Intoxication
    3. 阿片类物质戒断 (F11.23) Opioid Withdrawal
    4. 其他阿片类物质所致障碍 Other Opioid-induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的阿片类物质相关障碍 （F11.99) Unspecified Opioid-Related Disorder

(7) 镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药相关障碍：Sedative-, Hypnotic-, or Anxiolytic-Related Disorders

    1. 镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药使用障碍 Sedative, Hypnotic, or Anxiolytic Use Disorder
    2. 镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药中毒 Sedative, Hypnotic, or Anxiolytic Intoxication
    3. 镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药戒断 Sedative, Hypnotic, or Anxiolytic Withdrawal
    4. 其他镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药所致障碍 Other Sedative·, Hypnotic-, or Anxiolytic-Induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的镇静剂、催眠药或抗焦虑药相关障碍 (F13.99) Unspecified Sedative-, Hypnotic-, or Anxiolytic-Related Disorder

(8) 兴奋剂相关障碍：Stimulant-Related Disorders

    1. 兴奋剂使用障碍 Stimulant Use Disorder
    2. 兴奋剂中毒 Stimulant Intoxication
    3. 兴奋剂戒断 Stimulant Withdrawal
    4. 其他兴奋剂所致障碍 Other Stimulant-Induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的兴奋剂相关障碍 Unspecified Stimulant-Related Disorder

(9) 烟草相关障碍：Tobacco-Related Disorders

    1. 烟草使用障碍 Tobacco Use Disorder
    2. 烟草戒断 （F17.203) Tobacco Withdrawal
    3. 其他烟草所致障碍 Other Tobacco-Induced Disorders
    4. 未特定的烟草相关障碍 （F17.209) Unspecified Tobacco-Related Disorder

(10) 其他（或未知）物质相关障碍 Other (or Unknown) Substance-Induced Disorders：

    1. 其他（或未知）物质使用障碍 Other (or Unknown) Substance Use Disorder
    2. 其他（或未知）物质中毒 Other (or Unknown) Substance Intoxication
    3. 其他（或未知）物质戒断 (F19.239) Other (or Unknown) Substance Withdrawal
    4. 其他（或未知）物质所致障碍 Other (or Unknown) Substance-Induced Disorders
    5. 未特定的其他（或未知）物质相关障碍 （F19.99) Unspecified Other (or Unknown) Substance-Related Disorde

    1. 非物质相关障碍 Non-Substance-Related Disorders：

(1) 赌博障碍 (F63.0)：Gambling Disorder

Note:

香烟和鸦片的区别如下：

鸦片主要成分是罂粟碱 （镇静剂），属于精神类毒品，长期吸食会让人萎靡不振。

烟的主要成分是尼古丁（镇静剂），会让人神经兴奋，毒性比鸦片小的多，但长期吸食对人身体也是有害的。

人格障碍：Personality Disorders:

一般人格障碍：General Personality Disorder

（1）A类人格障碍：

    1. 偏执型人格障碍 （F60.0) Paranoid Personality Disorder

is a pattern of distrust and suspiciousness such that others' motives are interpreted as malevolent.

    1. 分裂样人格障碍 （F60.1) Schizoid Personality Disorder

is a pattern of detachment from social relationships and a restricted range of emotional expression.

    1. 分裂型人格障碍 （F21) Schizotypal Personality Disorder

is a pattern of acute discomfort in close relationships, cognitive or perceptual distortions, and eccentricities of behavior.

（2）B类人格障碍：

    1. 反社会型人格障碍 （F60.2) Antisocial Personality Disorder

is a pattern of disregard for, and violation of, the rights of others.

    1. 边缘型人格障碍 （F60.3) Borderline Personality Disorder

is a pattern of instability in interpersonal relationships, self-image, and affects, and marked impulsivity.

    1. 表演型人格障碍 （F60.4) Histrionic Personality Disorder

is a pattern of excessive emotionality and attention seeking.

    1. 自恋型人格障碍 （F60.81）Narcissistic Personality Disorder

is a pattern of grandiosity, need for admiration, and lack of empathy.

（3）C类人格障碍：

    1. 回避型人格障碍 （F60.6) Avoidant Personality Disorder

Avoidant personality disorder is a pattern of social inhibition, feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to negative evaluation.

    1. 依赖型人格障碍 （F60.7）Dependent Personality Disorder

Dependent personality disorder is a pattern of submissive and clinging behavior related to an excessive need to be taken care of.

    1. 强迫型人格障碍 （F60.5) Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder

Obsessive-compulsive personality disorder is a pattern of preoccupation with orderliness, perfectionism, and control.

其他人格障碍：

    1. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的人格改变 （F07.0) Personality Change Due to Another Medical Condition

is a persistent personality disturbance that is judged to be due to the direct physiological effects of a medical condition (e.g., frontal lobe lesion).

    1. 其他特定的人格障碍 （F60.89）Other Specified Personality Disorder

is a category provided for two situations: 1) the individual's personality pattern meets the general criteria for a personality disorder, and traits of several different personality disorders are present, but the criteria for any specific personality disorder are not met;

    1. 未特定的人格障碍 （F60.9) Unspecified Personality Disorder

is a category provided for two situations: 1) the individual's personality pattern meets the general criteria for a personality disorder, and traits of several different personality disorders are present, but the criteria for any specific personality disorder are not met;

Note:

Categorical model: 1. cognition, 2. affectivity, 3. interpersonal functioning, 4.impulse control

Dimensional model:1. personality functioning (identity, self-direction, empathy, intimacy) ;

2. psychological personality traits (FFM: negative affectivity, detachment, antagonism, disinhibition, psychoticism)

Psychodynamic model

A: lack of persistent psychotic symptoms ( i.e., hallucinations and delusions); withdrawn, cold, suspicious, or irrational

B: dramatic, erratic, and emotional; experience of emotional dysregulation and behave impulsively; reactive, emotional, and attention-seeking; their moods are labile and often shallow. They often have intense interpersonal conflicts.

C: anxiety and fearfulness; anxious and tense, often over-controlled or rigid in their thinking and behavior

其他精神障碍：Other Mental Disorders

    1. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的其他特定的精神障碍 F06.8 Other Specified IVIental Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition
    2. 由于其他躯体疾病所致的其他未特定的精神障碍 F09 Unspecified IVIental Disorder Due to Another Medical Condition
    3. 其他特定的精神障碍 F99 Other Specified Mental Disorder
    4. 未特定的精神障碍 F99 Unspecified Mental Disorder

药物所致的运动障碍及其他不良反应：Medication-Induced Movement Disorders and Other Adverse Effects of Medication

    1. 神经阻滞剂所致的帕金森氏综合征 G21.111 Neuroleptic-Induced Parkinsonism Other Medication-Induced Parkinsonism
    2. 其他药物所致的帕金森氏综合征 G21.19 Other Medication-Induced Parkinsonism
    3. 神经阻滞剂恶性综合征 G21.0 Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome
    4. 药物所致的急性肌张力障碍 G24.02 Medication-Induced Acute Dystonia
    5. 药物所致的急性静坐不能 G25.71 IVledication-lnduced Acute Al<atlnisia
    6. 迟发性运动障碍 G24.01 Tardive Dyskinesia
    7. 迟发性肌张力障碍 G24.09 Tardive Dystonia
    8. 迟发性静坐不能 G25.71 Tardive Akathisia
    9. 药物所致的体位性震颤 G25.1 Medication-Induced Postural Tremor
    10. 其他药物所致的运动障碍 G25.79 Other Medication-Induced Movement Disorder
    11. 抗抑郁药撤药综合征（初诊，复诊，后遗症诊治）Antidepressant Discontinuation Syndrome (Initial encounter\Subsequent encounter\Sequelae)
    12. 其他的药物不良反应（初诊，复诊，后遗症诊治）Other Adverse Effect of Medication (Initial encounter\Subsequent encounter\Sequelae)

可能成为临床关注焦点的其他状况： Other Conditions That May Be a Focus of Ciinicai Attention

A.关系问题 （亲密的成人伴侣关系、父母/照料者-儿童关系） Relational Problems

    1. 家庭教养相关问题 Problems Related to Family Upbringing
      1. 亲子关系问题 （Z62.820) Parent-Child Relational Problem
      2. 同胞关系问题 （Z62.891) Sibling Relational Problem
      3. 远离父母的教养 (Z62.29) Upbringing Away From Parents
      4. 受父母关系不和谐影响的儿童 （Z62.898) Child Affected by Parental Relationship Distress
    2. 与主要支持成员相关的其他问题 other Problems Related to Primary Support Group
      1. 与配偶或亲密伴侣关系不和谐 （Z63.0) Relationship Distress With Spouse or Intimate Partner
      2. 分居或离婚所致的家庭破裂 （Z63.5) Disruption of Family by Separation or Divorce
      3. 家庭内的高情感表达水平 （Z63.8) High Expressed Emotion Level Within Family
      4. 非复杂性的丧亲之痛 （Z63.4) Uncomplicated Bereavement

B.虐待和忽视 （遭受家庭成员或非亲属不良对待， 初诊和复诊）Abuse and Neglect

儿童虐待和忽视问题 Child Maltreatment and Neglect Problems

    1. 儿童躯体虐待 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Child Physical Abuse (Confirmed\Initial encounter\Subsequent encounter\Other Circumstances Related to the condition)
    2. 儿童性虐待（已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Child Sexual Abuse
    3. 儿童忽视 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Child Neglect
    4. 儿童心理虐待（已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Child Psychological Abuse

成人虐待和忽视问题 Adult Maltreatment and Neglect Problems

    1. 配偶或伴侣躯体暴力 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Spouse or Partner Violence, Physical
    2. 配偶或伴侣性暴力 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Spouse or Partner Violence, Sexual
    3. 配偶或伴侣忽视 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Spouse or Partner Neglect
    4. 配偶或伴侣心理虐待 （已确认、可疑、与此相关的其他情况）Spouse or Partner Abuse, Psychological
    5. 成人的非配偶或非伴侣虐待 Adult Abuse by Nonspouse or Nonpartner
      1. 成人的非配偶或非伴侣躯体虐待 （已确认、可疑）Adult Physical Abuse by Nonspouse or Nonpartner (Confirmed\Suspected)
      2. 成人的非配偶或非伴侣性虐待 （已确认、可疑）Adult Sexual Abuse by Nonspouse or Nonpartner
      3. 成人的非配偶或非伴侣心理虐待 （已确认、可疑）Adult Psychological Abuse by Nonspouse or Nonpartner
      4. 与成人的非配偶或非伴侣虐待相关的其他情况 Other Circumstances Related to Adult Abuse by Nonspouse or Nonpartner

C.教育和职业问题 Educational and Occupational Problems

教育问题 Educational Problems

    1. 学业或教育问题 Z55.9 Academic or Educational Problem

职业问题 Occupational Problems

    1. 与目前均是派遣状态相关的问题 Z56.82 Problem Related to Current Military Deployment Status
    2. 与就业相关的其他问题 Z56.9 Other Problem Related to Employment

D.住房和经济问题 Housing and Economic Problems

住房问题 Housing and Economic Problems

    1. 无家可归 Z59.0 Homelessness
    2. 住房不足 Z59.1 Inadequate Housing
    3. 邻居、房客或房东关系不和谐 Z59.2 Discord With Neighbor, Lodger, or Landlord
    4. 与居住在寄宿机构相关的问题 Z59.3 Problem Related to Living in a Residential Institution

经济问题 Economic Problems

    1. 缺乏足够的食物或安全的饮用水 Z59.4 Lack of Adequate Food or Safe Drinking Water
    2. 极端贫困 Z59.5 Extreme Poverty
    3. 低收入 Z59.6 Low Income
    4. 社会保险或福利支持不足 Z59.7 Insufficient Social Insurance or Welfare Support
    5. 未特定的住房或经济问题 Z59.9 Unspecified Housing or Economic Problem

E.与社会环境相关的其他问题 Other Problems Related to the Social Enviroriment

    1. 生命阶段问题 Z60.0 Phase of Life Problem
    2. 与独居相关的问题 Z60.2 Problem Related to Living Alone
    3. 文化适应困难 Z60.3 Acculturation Difficulty
    4. 社会排斥或拒绝 Z60.4 Social Exclusion or Rejection
    5. （感觉是）被歧视或被迫害的对象 Z60.5 Target of (Perceived) Adverse Discrimination or Persecution
    6. 与社会环境相关的未特定的问题 Z60.9 Unspecified Problem Related to Social Environment

F.与犯罪相关或涉及法律系统的问题 Problems Related to Crime or Interaction With the Legal System

    1. 犯罪的受害者 Z65.4 Victim of Crime
    2. 在民事或刑事诉讼中被定罪但未被监禁 Z65.0 Conviction in Civil or Criminal Proceedings Without Imprisonment
    3. 监禁或其他形式的拘押 Z65.2 Imprisonment or Other Incarceration
    4. 与从监狱释放相关的问题 Z65.2 Problems Related to Release From Prison
    5. 与其他法律情况相关的问题 Z65.3 Problems Related to Other Legal Circumstances

G.咨询和医疗建议的其他健康服务 Other Health Service Encounters for Counseling and Medical Advice

    1. 性咨询 Z70.9 Sex Counseling
    2. 其他咨询或会诊 Z71.9 Other Counseling or Consultation

H.与其他心理社会、个人和环境相关的问题 Problems Related to Other Psychosocial, Personal, and Environmental Circumstances

    1. 宗教或信仰问题 Z65.8 Religious or Spiritual Problem
    2. 与意外怀孕相关的问题 Z64.0 Problems Related to Unwanted Pregnancy
    3. 与多胞胎相关的问题 Z64.1 Problems Related to Multiparity
    4. 与社会服务提供者关系不和谐，包括假释官、案例管理者或社会服务工作者 Z64.4 Discord With Social Service Provider, Including Probation Officer,

Case Manager, or Social Services Worker

    1. 恐怖主义或酷刑的受害者 Z65.4 Victim of Terrorism or Torture
    2. 遭遇灾难、战争或其他敌对行动 Z65.5 Exposure to Disaster, War, or Other Hostilities
    3. 与心理社会情况相关的其他问题 Z65.8 Other Problem Related to Psychosocial Circumstances
    4. 与未特定的心理社会情况相关的未特定问题 Z65.9 Unspecified Problem Related to Unspecified Psychosocial Circumstances

I.个人史的其他情况 Other Circumstances of Personal History

    1. 心理创伤的其他个人史 Z91.49 Other Personal History of Psychological Trauma
    2. 自我伤害的个人史 Z91.5 Personal History of Self-Harm
    3. 军事派遣的个人史 Z91.82 Personal History of Military Deployment
    4. 其他个人风险因素 Z91.89 Other Personal Risk Factors
    5. 与生活方式相关的问题 Z72.9 Problem Related to Lifestyle
    6. 成人的反社会行为 Z72.811 Adult Antisocial Behavior
    7. 儿童或青少年的反社会行为 Z72.810 Child or Adolescent Antisocial Behavior

与获得医疗和其他健康服务相关的问题 Problems Related to Access to Medical and Other Health Care

    1. 无法获得或不能使用健康服务机构 Z75.3 Unavailability or Inaccessibility of Health Care Facilities
    2. 无法获得或不能使用其他助人机构 Z75.4 Unavailability or Inaccessibility of Other Helping Agencies

对医疗的不依从 Nonadherence to Medical Treatment

    1. 对医疗的不依从 Z91.19 Nonadherence to Medical Treatment
    2. 超重或肥胖 E66.9 Overweight or Obesity
    3. 诈病 Z76.5 Malingering
    4. 与精神障碍有关的流浪 Z91.83 Wandering Associated With a Mental Disorder
    5. 边缘性智力功能 R41.83 Borderline Intellectual Functioning

参考文献：

American Psychiatric Association. (2013). Diagnostic and statistical manual of mental disorders (DSM-5®). American Psychiatric Pub.

《精神疾病診斷與統計手冊》（The Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders，簡稱DSM），由美國精神醫學學會出版，是一本在美國與其他國家中最常使用來診斷精神疾病的指導手冊（维基百科）。

Unknown) Substance-Related Disorde</li></ol><br><ol><li data-pid="2LpGPlu7"><b>非物质相关障碍</b> <b>Non-Substance-Related       Disorders：</b></li></ol></ol><p data-pid="FPqyTkS9"><b><u>(1) 赌博障碍 (F63.0)：Gambling Disorder</u></b></p><p data-pid="cdRCzJMM">Note:</p><p data-pid="RIYGdTtn">香烟和鸦片的区别如下：</p><p data-pid="-g87BCrZ">鸦片主要成分是罂粟碱 （镇静剂），属于精神类毒品，长期吸食会让人萎靡不振。</p><p data-pid="j4VDxEIQ">烟的主要成分是尼古丁（镇静剂），会让人神经兴奋，毒性比鸦片小的多，但长期吸食对人身体也是有害的。</p><p data-pid="LLARdMyf"><b><u>人格障碍：Personality Disorders:</u></b></p><p data-pid="n7NYa3zL"><b><u>一般人格障碍：General  Personality Disorder</u></b></p><p data-pid="IYP15sb_"><b><u>（1）A类人格障碍：</u></b></p><ol><ol><li data-pid="zYcvTWS5">偏执型人格障碍 （F60.0)       Paranoid Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="iA8FyBkO">is a pattern of distrust and suspiciousness such that others'  motives are interpreted as malevolent.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="jIaSq_rE">分裂样人格障碍 （F60.1)       Schizoid Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="ykdsCO1b">is a pattern of detachment from social relationships and a  restricted range of emotional expression.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="MX8-3vF0">分裂型人格障碍 （F21)       Schizotypal Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="vCS6ePGs">is a pattern of acute discomfort in close relationships, cognitive  or perceptual distortions, and eccentricities of behavior.</p><p data-pid="VqHEAOYH"><b><u>（2）B类人格障碍：</u></b></p><ol><ol><li data-pid="dqBBGW4u">反社会型人格障碍 （F60.2)       Antisocial Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="1CE1CsXA">is a pattern of disregard for, and violation of, the rights of  others.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="SiQZ_NEH">边缘型人格障碍 （F60.3)       Borderline Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="T1SM4aSN"> is a pattern of instability  in interpersonal relationships, self-image, and affects, and marked  impulsivity.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="bZtyC1H9">表演型人格障碍 （F60.4)       Histrionic Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="Yj6zns9w">is a pattern of excessive emotionality and attention seeking.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="ovE5UcoQ">自恋型人格障碍 （F60.81）Narcissistic       Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="AOOpVHkc"> is a pattern of grandiosity,  need for admiration, and lack of empathy.</p><p data-pid="WXRJGGht"><b><u>（3）C类人格障碍：</u></b></p><ol><ol><li data-pid="yhGTtg8q">回避型人格障碍 （F60.6)       Avoidant Personality Disorder </li></ol></ol><p data-pid="4onQ0Qya">Avoidant personality disorder is a pattern of social inhibition,  feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to negative evaluation.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="vT46ZOyh">依赖型人格障碍 （F60.7）Dependent       Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="gCjljK1i">Dependent personality disorder is a pattern of submissive and  clinging behavior related to an excessive need to be taken care of.</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="5rlEJNEc">强迫型人格障碍 （F60.5)       Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="uDZiCet9">Obsessive-compulsive personality disorder is a pattern of  preoccupation with orderliness, perfectionism, and control.</p><p data-pid="KJyatoRd"><b><u>其他人格障碍：</u></b></p><ol><ol><li data-pid="dB2YIHu_">由于其他躯体疾病所致的人格改变 （F07.0)       Personality Change Due to Another Medical Condition</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="wX0wEiiy">is a persistent personality disturbance that is judged to be due to  the direct physiological effects of a medical condition (e.g., frontal lobe  lesion).</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="lSWWATOC">其他特定的人格障碍 （F60.89）Other       Specified Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="q3m7-kFY">is a category provided for two situations: 1) the individual's  personality pattern meets the general criteria for a personality disorder, and  traits of several different personality disorders are present, but the  criteria for any specific personality disorder are not met;</p><ol><ol><li data-pid="Mv7wtbiM">未特定的人格障碍 （F60.9)       Unspecified Personality Disorder</li></ol></ol><p data-pid="sVxwPNPu">is a category provided for two situations: 1) the individual's  personality pattern meets the general criteria for a personality disorder, and  traits of several different personality disorders are present, but the  criteria for any specific personality disorder are not met;</p><p data-pid="anc6nDyD"><b><u>Note:</u></b></p><p data-pid="EziQe0vN">Categorical  model: 1. cognition, 2. affectivity, 3.  interpersonal functioning, 4.impulse control</p><p data-pid="6yD-Mk0R">Dimensional  model:1. personality functioning (identity, self-direction, empathy, intimacy)  ;</p><p data-pid="GHevO_gN"> 2. psychological  personality traits (FFM: negative affectivity, detachment, antagonism,  disinhibition, psychoticism)</p><p data-pid="spPGGsWM">Psychodynamic  model</p><p data-pid="fZfHpjFz">A: lack  of persistent psychotic symptoms (  i.e., hallucinations and delusions); withdrawn, cold, suspicious, or  irrational</p><p data-pid="Y-9hdYSU">B:  dramatic, erratic, and emotional; experience of emotional dysregulation and  behave impulsively; reactive,  emotional, and attention-seeking; their moods are labile and often shallow. They often have intense  interpersonal conflicts.</p><p data-pid="bMMv2Lck">C:  anxiety and fearfulness; anxious and tense, often over-controlled or rigid in  their thinking and behavior</p><p expression.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"MX8-3vF0\"\u003E分裂型人格障碍 （F21)       Schizotypal Personality and eccentricities of behavior.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"VqHEAOYH\"\u003E\u003Cb\u003E\u003Cu\u003E（2）B类人格障碍：\u003C\u002Fu\u003E\u003C\u002Fb\u003E\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"dqBBGW4u\"\u003E反社会型人格障碍 （F60.2) others.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"SiQZ_NEH\"\u003E边缘型人格障碍 （F60.3)       Borderline Personality  impulsivity.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"bZtyC1H9\"\u003E表演型人格障碍 （F60.4)       Histrionic Personality Disorder\u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"Yj6zns9w\"\u003Eis a pattern of excessive emotionality and attention seeking.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"ovE5UcoQ\"\u003E自恋型人格障碍 （F60.81）Narcissistic       Personality Disorder\u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"AOOpVHkc\"\u003E is a pattern of grandiosity,  need for admiration, and lack of empathy.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"WXRJGGht\"\u003E\u003Cb\u003E\u003Cu\u003E（3）C类人格障碍：\u003C\u002Fu\u003E\u003C\u002Fb\u003E\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"yhGTtg8q\"\u003E回避型人格障碍 （F60.6)       Avoidant Personality Disorder \u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"4onQ0Qya\"\u003EAvoidant personality disorder is a pattern of social inhibition,  feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to negative evaluation.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"vT46ZOyh\"\u003E依赖型人格障碍 （F60.7）Dependent       Personality Disorder\u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"gCjljK1i\"\u003EDependent personality disorder is a pattern of submissive and  clinging behavior related to an excessive need to be taken care of.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"5rlEJNEc\"\u003E强迫型人格障碍 （F60.5)       Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder\u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"uDZiCet9\"\u003EObsessive-compulsive personality disorder is a pattern of  preoccupation with orderliness, perfectionism, and control.\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"KJyatoRd\"\u003E\u003Cb\u003E\u003Cu\u003E其他人格障碍：\u003C\u002Fu\u003E\u003C\u002Fb\u003E\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"dB2YIHu_\"\u003E由于其他躯体疾病所致的人格改变 that is judged to be due to  the direct physiological effects of a medical condition (e.g., frontal lobe  lesion).\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"lSWWATOC\"\u003E其他特定的人格障碍 （F60.89）Other       Specified Personality Disorder\u003C\u002Fli\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003C\u002Fol\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"q3m7-kFY\"\u003Eis a category provided for two situations: 1) the individual's  personality pattern meets the general criteria for a personality disorder, and  traits of several different personality disorders are present, but the  criteria for any specific personality disorder are not met;\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli data-pid=\"Mv7wtbiM\"\u003E未特定的人格障碍 （F60.9)       Unspecified Personality met;\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"anc6nDyD\"\u003E\u003Cb\u003E\u003Cu\u003ENote:\u003C\u002Fu\u003E\u003C\u002Fb\u003E\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"EziQe0vN\"\u003ECategorical  model: psychoticism)\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"spPGGsWM\"\u003EPsychodynamic  model\u003C\u002Fp\u003E\u003Cp data-pid=\"fZfHpjFz\"\u003EA: lack  of persistent psychotic symptoms (  i.e.,
